verses.text: \w And|strong="H6030"\w* Elihu went on \w to|strong="H6030"\w* say:

“Do \w you|strong="H6664"\w* \w think|strong="H2803"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*? \w You|strong="H6664"\w* say, ‘I am more \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* than God.’\f + \fr 35:2 \ft Or ‘I am righteous before God.’\f*

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ask, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w benefit|strong="H3276"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w gain|strong="H3276"\w* apart \w from|strong="H2403"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*?’

I \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w reply|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w as|strong="H5973"\w* \w well|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; \w gaze|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* \w high|strong="H1361"\w* \w above|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2398"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w*? \w If|strong="H2398"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7231"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w*?

If \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Your|strong="H6666"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* affects only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* yourself, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6666"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Men|strong="H7227"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* under \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6217"\w*; \w they|strong="H6217"\w* plead \w for|strong="H7768"\w* relief \w from|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H2220"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H2220"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* asks, ‘\w Where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*, \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w songs|strong="H2158"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*,

who teaches \w us|strong="H2449"\w* more than \w the|strong="H8064"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H8064"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w makes|strong="H2449"\w* \w us|strong="H2449"\w* \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w* than \w the|strong="H8064"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H8064"\w* \w air|strong="H8064"\w*?’

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w empty|strong="H7723"\w* pleas, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* take note \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* much \w less|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* say \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7789"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w case|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w wait|strong="H7789"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3045"\w* further, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H3045"\w* anger \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w much|strong="H3966"\w* \w notice|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* folly!

\w So|strong="H1097"\w* Job \w opens|strong="H6475"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w and|strong="H1892"\w* \w multiplies|strong="H3527"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w without|strong="H1097"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.”
